title: Marvel Adventures Spider-Man: Amazing
description: Get ready for all-new, all-ages action in this new beginning for everybody's favorite teenage wallcrawler! It's wall-to-wall mayhem in the Mighty Marvel Manner with four original tales featuring Spider-Man and guest stars galore! Featuring Shang-Chi, Wolverine, the Blonde Phantom and Bullseye!COLLECTING:Spider-Man Vol. 2 #1-4
author: Paul Tobin
